content.rendered:
CROSS-DISCIPLINARY SERVICES AND EFFICIENCY TOOLS TO STREAMLINE YOUR ACCOUNTING CHALLENGES

At Elevar Accounting, our team of accounting professionals can help your practice seamlessly deliver timely, accurate, and reliable accounting services and solutions to your clients. Our business model of combined technology and offshore teams results in an affordable cost structure that any size firm can leverage for increased efficiency. Select the level of service and support that is right for your firm’s operational needs

Engagement Models

    • Model Description
    • Engagement Type
    • Pricing
    • Volume based discounts
    • Note

Pay as you go

  • Pay only for the number of hours we work. This model allows you to be flexible and scale as and when required.
  • Job Based
  • Billed at the end of month
  • Ideal for accountancy practices who have seasonal requirements
  • Request A Quote

Value Pricing

  • Looking at the scope of work and estimate number of hours, get the price fixed per month.
  • Fixed
  • Billed at the start of the month
  • Ideal for businesses who have fixed number of tasks every month to be performed.
  • Request A Quote

Block of Hours

  • Select and buy from pre-paid slab of hours i.e. 600,900,1200 & 1,500 annual hours. Delivered hours get deducted from the total number of hours purchased.
  • Project Based
  • Billed at the start of the month
  • Perfect for accountants with regular and known small to medium volumes of accounting tasks or where the scope of work cannot be clearly defined.
  • Request A Quote

FTE

  • Get a dedicated team working exclusively on your project and allows you to have more direct control.
  • Project Based
  • Billed at the start of the month
  • Ideal for accountancy practices that have large volumes of work to outsource, have standardized processes and have a measurable service level requirement.
  • Request A Quote
